medium: Cotton, camelid fiber; woven fabric with discontinuous supplementary weft patterning and embroidery
title: Textile Fragment
description: Fragment of garment including neck opening. Brown plain weave with supplementary weft patterning in two rectangular areas (one is mostly gone). Patterns are of fish and birds in red, yellow, and shades of brown. Frayed.
creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
